result.execSummary:
The defendant Roy E. Martin Jr. was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Roy E. Martin Jr.

records.addlTxt: w/Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief

Clerk: Amanda. 
Case Called at 2:04 pm.
State appears by ADA Cody Marschall.  Defendant appears, pro se. 
VRCW. 

Date and time set for FPT. 
Court notes JT is currently set; 
Defendant is going to proceed without Counsel. 
Defendant states he would like to accept the State's offer and move forward with a Plea Hearing.

OTR: 2:06 pm. 
BOTR: 2:15 pm. 

Same appearances. 
Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights filed.  
PLEA to Ct.1(DC/Domestic Abuse)>>GUILTY. 

COURT advises defendant of rights (including constitutional rights) & penalties & questions defendant to understanding; 
COURT finds plea & waiver of rights freely & voluntary made, defendant is competent to represent self, a factual basis & defendant guilty;

COURT ORDERS: Pay $25+CC/DNA surcharge and provide sample. 
Adj: 2:20 pm.

ADA Marschall appears
Deft appears
Dates already set
Marathon County Victim Waiver of No Contact Bond Condition- A.B.

Pre-trial conference on July 13, 2022 at 09:30 am.
Final pre-trial on August 15, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
Jury Trial on September 20, 2022 at 09:00 am.

No contact with victim(s):  A.P.B. or residence. Contact includes direct personal or physical and indirect contact by phone, in writing of any kind, entry to the person's residence or place of employment together with contacts through other persons.  Contact, however, may be made through the defendant's attorney. Police escort to retrieve personal property from the residence. Report to ATTIC Corrections Services within one business day of release.Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level 1 supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening.

Clerk: Amanda.
Case called at 3:31 pm.
State appears by ADA Cody Marschall. Defendant appears from MCJ, and by Attorney Jack Mathie. 
Date and Time set for IA; VRCW. 

Reading Waived.  Reserve Jurisdiction. 
Court questions deft re: complaint and rights.
Advised Right of Counsel. 

PLEA:  NOT GUILTY. 

COURT ORDERS: $500 signature bond - CONDITIONS: 
- No contact with victim(s):  A.P.B. or residence. Contact includes direct personal or physical and indirect contact by phone, in writing of any kind, entry to the person's residence or place of employment together with contacts through other persons.  Contact, however, may be made through the defendant's attorney.
- Police escort to retrieve personal property from the residence. 

- Report to ATTIC Corrections Services within one business day of release.Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level 1 supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening.

>>FUTURE DATES: 
PTC: 7/13 at 9:30 
FPT: 8/15 at 2
JT: 9/20 at 9


Adj: 3:32 pm.
